body_html: @SsnL To disable sccache when building NCCL, we can try to remove /opt/cache/bin/ from PATH and also set CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE to empty or $(which nvcc) in https://github.com/SsnL/pytorch/blob/master/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh#L197, and set them back when NCCL build is done. If this doesn't work well I can also dig into what's going on between sccache and NCCL build.

body: @SsnL To disable `sccache` when building NCCL, we can try to remove `/opt/cache/bin/` from PATH and also set `CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE` to empty or `$(which nvcc)` in https://github.com/SsnL/pytorch/blob/master/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh#L197, and set them back when NCCL build is done. If this doesn't work well I can also dig into what's going on between `sccache` and NCCL build.
